body.name: Hasuit 6 Drawer Double Dresser, 55.3'' Long Dresser Chest of Drawers, Large Capacity Solid Wood Storage Cabinet, White Dresser for Bedroom, Living Room, Hallway (Modern White)
features: 【Large Capacity Storage】55.3''W×15.8''D×29.5''H. Each drawer measures 14.2 inches deep, and the 6 large drawers can help you organize scattered clothing, documents, collected jewelry, or any other personal items. The large tabletop can place your lamps, aromatherapy, photo frames, potted plants, and other decorations. This large-capacity dresser can meet different storage needs, free up more living space, make your room tidier, and create a warm atmosphere.

【Quality Assurance】The white 6 drawers dresser is made of high-quality solid pine wood and engineered wood, with natural texture, not easily deformed, and durable. 5 solid wood legs and anti-tip device enhance stability and ensure the safety of your family. The surface of dresser is sprayed with friendly water-based varnish, and the corners are polished, making it waterproof and easy to clean. Meet your pursuit of quality.

【Elegant and Stylish】The stylish white finish and classic black double knob handle match perfectly, with a modern and simple style, which can be easily integrated into any style of home, making your room look tidier and brighter, creating a warm atmosphere. Use alone or in combination with other Hasuit chests of drawers.

【Suitable for Different Corners】The simple and modern chest of drawers has a large storage capacity, allowing it to adapt well to various space environments. Use as a dressing table in the bedroom, a nightstand next to the bed, a closet to store clothes, a storage cabinet in the living room, a toy storage cabinet in the nursery or to store take-out items in the entryway, or even as a dresser TV stand, used to place electronic equipment, etc.

【To Serve You】Hasuit drawer dresser has clear Installation steps, and all parts are individually packed and marked. If you have any problems with assembly and instructions, please contact our store's support team first and we’ll give you a solution. Thank you for your support and trust！

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hasuit White Dresser for Bedroom, Modern Solid Wood 55.3'' Long Dresser for Home Do you have not enough place to put your clothes, your children's toys, and all kinds of clutter at home? Add a stylish, simple storage solution to your room with the Hasuit 6 drawers white dresser. Hasuit large-capacity double dresser can meet different storage needs, and free up more living space.

The stylish white finish and classic black double knob, with a modern and simple style. Can be put in any corner of the home to play a role. 55" Wide tabletop can place some items within reach, can also be used as a dresser TV stand, which is great for displaying CDs, DVDs, game controllers, etc.

Large Capacity Storage Dresser Perfect for Small Spaces △ Overall Dimensions：55.3''W×15.8''D×29.5''H △ Drawer Dimensions：24.2''W×14.2''D×6.1''H, each drawer can hold up to 33 lbs △ Each drawer measures 14.2 inches deep,3 large drawers can help you organize scattered clothing or any other personal items △ Easy-to-pull metal double-knob handle & smooth metal slide rails for easy access to items △ Large tabletop can place your lamps, aromatherapy, photo frames, potted plants, and other decorations. Meet different storage needs, free up more living space

Ensure the safety of your family, meet your pursuit of quality Dresser is made of high-quality solid wood and engineered wood, with natural texture, not easily deformed, and durable. 5 solid wood legs and an anti-tip device enhance stability. The surface of dresser is sprayed with varnish, and the corners are polished, making it waterproof and easy to clean.

Wide Dresser has large storage capacity, allowing to adapt well to various space Use as a dressing table in the bedroom, a nightstand next to the bed, a closet to store clothes, a storage cabinet in the living room, a toy storage cabinet in the nursery or to store take-out items in the entryway, or even as a dresser TV stand, used to place electronic equipment, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice small dresser
reviews.reviewText: This dresser looks very nice and is sturdy. The drawers glide open and closed. The white finish goes perfectly in my Grandson’s bedroom. It is heavy and I needed to carry it to the room in pieces and assemble it there. Goes together easily if you take your time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great!
reviews.reviewText: Had no trouble putting them together at all. Using two as nightstands. Came well packaged with no scratches or anything. All holes lined up as they should. A bit tedious to assemble but sturdy and looks great. Really great piece for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap presswood construction
reviews.reviewText: The item really looks nice. It was easy to construct and does not appear to be shaky but some of the wood supports are made very flimsy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice piece, you'll need a drill though
reviews.reviewText: I'm happy with this piece. It looks good, feels sturdy, and went together with ease -- but part of that is because I own a drill and know how to use it.The instructions say all you need is a screw driver and the provided allen wrench, but the drawer slides don't have any pilot holes; you'll have to drill those yourself. It's easy though, as the drawer slides line up against proud edges of the drawer and into a corner, so you can hold the slide in place and pop in three pilot holes in the right place easily.It's a shame the discontinued this one; I'm happy enough with it that I came back to order a second one for the other side of the closet. Ah well, my furniture will be eclectic now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It’s nice for a cheap furniture piece. It does take a while to assemble, but the instructions were easy. The drawers close but don’t glide well. You get what you pay for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what we needed!
reviews.reviewText: This dresser fits our space perfectly. We put this in our closet under our hanging clothes so we needed very specific dimensions and it fits great! It took my husband about 45 minutes to assemble and it looks exactly like the product picture. The drawers open and close easily without any issues. Great find!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Have had this in my son's nursery for 4 months and it's worked great. Drawers have plenty of space for his clothes and have held up very nice. Overall the dresser is super sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased two of these to use as matching nightstands on either side of our bed. While putting them together was much, much more time consuming and labor intensive than I’d expected (I’m one of those people who actually enjoys putting furniture together), they came together nicely and we love the look.The one thing we can’t get over though is the odor. There’s a strong chemical smell that hasn’t gone away in the slightest (it’s been well over a month since we put them together), and we both wake each morning with a headache. Both units have the odor, so we know it can’t just be a mishap with one.We have decided that we’ll need to place them in another area until (hopefully) the smell dissipates.As much as we really like what the units look like, if we’d have know about this odor issue prior to purchasing, we definitely wouldn’t have bought them. Super frustrating.
